00032 CPDragOperationNone     = 0,
00033 CPDragOperationCopy     = 1 << 1,
00034 CPDragOperationLink     = 1 << 1,
00035 CPDragOperationGeneric  = 1 << 2,
00036 CPDragOperationPrivate  = 1 << 3,
00037 CPDragOperationMove     = 1 << 4,
00038 CPDragOperationDelete   = 1 << 5,
00039 CPDragOperationEvery    = -1;

00041 #define DRAGGING_WINDOW(anObject) ([anObject isKindOfClass:[CPWindow class]] ? anObject : [anObject window])
00042 
00043 var    CPDragServerPreviousEvent      = nil,
00044 CPDragServerAutoscrollInterval = nil;
00045 /*
00046 var CPDragServerAutoscroll = function()
00047 {
00048     [CPDragServerSource autoscroll:CPDragServerPreviousEvent];
00049 }
00050 
00051     if (CPDragServerAutoscrollInterval === nil)
00052     {
00053         if ([CPDragServerSource respondsToSelector:@selector(autoscroll:)])
00054             CPDragServerAutoscrollInterval = setInterval(CPDragServerAutoscroll, 100);
00055     }
00056 
00057     CPDragServerPreviousEvent = anEvent;
00058 
00059         if (CPDragServerAutoscrollInterval !== nil)
00060             clearInterval(CPDragServerAutoscrollInterval);
00061 
00062         CPDragServerAutoscrollInterval = nil;
00063 */

00129 var CPDraggingSource_draggedImage_movedTo_          = 1 << 0,
00130     CPDraggingSource_draggedImage_endAt_operation_  = 1 << 1,
00131     CPDraggingSource_draggedView_movedTo_           = 1 << 2,
00132     CPDraggingSource_draggedView_endedAt_operation_ = 1 << 3;

00159 + (void)initialize
00160 {
00161     if (self !== [CPDragServer class])
00162         return;
00163 
00164     CPDragServerDraggingInfo = [[CPDraggingInfo alloc] init];
00165 }

00167 + (CPDragServer)sharedDragServer
00168 {
00169     if (!CPSharedDragServer)
00170         CPSharedDragServer = [[CPDragServer alloc] init];
00171 
00172     return CPSharedDragServer;
00173 }

00176     @ignore

00178 - (id)init
00179 {
00180     self = [super init];
00181 
00182     if (self)
00183     {
00184         _draggedWindow = [[CPWindow alloc] initWithContentRect:_CGRectMakeZero() styleMask:CPBorderlessWindowMask];
00185 
00186         [_draggedWindow setLevel:CPDraggingWindowLevel];
00187     }
00188 
00189     return self;
00190 }
00191 
00192 - (CGPoint)draggingLocation
00193 {
00194     return _draggingLocation
00195 }
00196 
00197 - (void)draggingStartedInPlatformWindow:(CPPlatformWindow)aPlatformWindow globalLocation:(CGPoint)aLocation
00198 {
00199     if (_isDraggingImage)
00200     {
00201         if ([_draggingSource respondsToSelector:@selector(draggedImage:beganAt:)])
00202             [_draggingSource draggedImage:[_draggedView image] beganAt:aLocation];
00203     }
00204     else
00205     {
00206         if ([_draggingSource respondsToSelector:@selector(draggedView:beganAt:)])
00207             [_draggingSource draggedView:_draggedView beganAt:aLocation];
00208     }
00209 
00210     if (![CPPlatform supportsDragAndDrop])
00211         [_draggedWindow orderFront:self];
00212 }
00213 
00214 - (void)draggingSourceUpdatedWithGlobalLocation:(CGPoint)aGlobalLocation
00215 {
00216     if (![CPPlatform supportsDragAndDrop])
00217         [_draggedWindow setFrameOrigin:_CGPointMake(aGlobalLocation.x - _draggingOffset.width, aGlobalLocation.y - _draggingOffset.height)];
00218 
00219     if (_implementedDraggingSourceMethods & CPDraggingSource_draggedImage_movedTo_)
00220         [_draggingSource draggedImage:[_draggedView image] movedTo:aGlobalLocation];
00221 
00222     else if (_implementedDraggingSourceMethods & CPDraggingSource_draggedView_movedTo_)
00223         [_draggingSource draggedView:_draggedView movedTo:aGlobalLocation];
00224 }
00225 
00226 - (CPDragOperation)draggingUpdatedInPlatformWindow:(CPPlatformWindow)aPlatformWindow location:(CGPoint)aLocation
00227 {
00228     var dragOperation = CPDragOperationCopy;
00229     // We have to convert base to bridge since the drag event comes from the source window, not the drag window.
00230     var draggingDestination = [aPlatformWindow _dragHitTest:aLocation pasteboard:[CPDragServerDraggingInfo draggingPasteboard]];
00231 
00232     if (draggingDestination)
00233         _draggingLocation = [DRAGGING_WINDOW(draggingDestination) convertPlatformWindowToBase:aLocation];
00234 
00235     if(draggingDestination !== _draggingDestination)
00236     {
00237         if (_draggingDestination && [_draggingDestination respondsToSelector:@selector(draggingExited:)])
00238             [_draggingDestination draggingExited:CPDragServerDraggingInfo];
00239 
00240         _draggingDestination = draggingDestination;
00241 
00242         if (_draggingDestination && [_draggingDestination respondsToSelector:@selector(draggingEntered:)])
00243             dragOperation = [_draggingDestination draggingEntered:CPDragServerDraggingInfo];
00244     }
00245     else if (_draggingDestination && [_draggingDestination respondsToSelector:@selector(draggingUpdated:)])
00246         dragOperation = [_draggingDestination draggingUpdated:CPDragServerDraggingInfo];
00247 
00248     if (!_draggingDestination)
00249         dragOperation = CPDragOperationNone;
00250 
00251     return dragOperation;
00252 }
00253 
00254 - (void)draggingEndedInPlatformWindow:(CPPlatformWindow)aPlatformWindow globalLocation:(CGPoint)aLocation operation:(CPDragOperation)anOperation
00255 {
00256     [_draggedView removeFromSuperview];
00257 
00258     if (![CPPlatform supportsDragAndDrop])
00259         [_draggedWindow orderOut:self];
00260 
00261     if (_implementedDraggingSourceMethods & CPDraggingSource_draggedImage_endAt_operation_)
00262         [_draggingSource draggedImage:[_draggedView image] endedAt:aLocation operation:anOperation];
00263 
00264     else if (_implementedDraggingSourceMethods & CPDraggingSource_draggedView_endedAt_operation_)
00265         [_draggingSource draggedView:_draggedView endedAt:aLocation operation:anOperation];
00266 
00267     _isDragging = NO;
00268 }
00269 
00270 - (void)performDragOperationInPlatformWindow:(CPPlatformWindow)aPlatformWindow
00271 {
00272     if (_draggingDestination && 
00273         (![_draggingDestination respondsToSelector:@selector(prepareForDragOperation:)] || [_draggingDestination prepareForDragOperation:CPDragServerDraggingInfo]) && 
00274         (![_draggingDestination respondsToSelector:@selector(performDragOperation:)] || [_draggingDestination performDragOperation:CPDragServerDraggingInfo]) &&
00275         [_draggingDestination respondsToSelector:@selector(concludeDragOperation:)])
00276         [_draggingDestination concludeDragOperation:CPDragServerDraggingInfo];
00277 }
00278 
00291 - (void)dragView:(CPView)aView fromWindow:(CPWindow)aWindow at:(CGPoint)viewLocation offset:(CGSize)mouseOffset event:(CPEvent)mouseDownEvent pasteboard:(CPPasteboard)aPasteboard source:(id)aSourceObject slideBack:(BOOL)slideBack
00292 {
00293     _isDragging = YES;
00294 
00295     _draggedView = aView;
00296     _draggingPasteboard = aPasteboard || [CPPasteboard pasteboardWithName:CPDragPboard];
00297     _draggingSource = aSourceObject;
00298     _draggingDestination = nil;
00299 
00300     // The offset is based on the distance from where we want the view to be initially from where the mouse is initially
00301     // Hence the use of mouseDownEvent's location and view's location in global coordinates.
00302     var mouseDownWindow = [mouseDownEvent window],
00303         mouseDownEventLocation = [mouseDownEvent locationInWindow];
00304 
00305     if (mouseDownEventLocation)
00306     {
00307         if (mouseDownWindow)
00308             mouseDownEventLocation = [mouseDownWindow convertBaseToGlobal:mouseDownEventLocation];
00309 
00310         _draggingOffset = _CGSizeMake(mouseDownEventLocation.x - viewLocation.x, mouseDownEventLocation.y - viewLocation.y);
00311     }
00312     else
00313         _draggingOffset = _CGSizeMakeZero();
00314 
00315     if ([CPPlatform isBrowser])
00316         [_draggedWindow setPlatformWindow:[aWindow platformWindow]];
00317 
00318     [aView setFrameOrigin:_CGPointMakeZero()];
00319 
00320     var mouseLocation = [CPEvent mouseLocation];
00321 
00322     // Place it where the mouse pointer is.
00323     [_draggedWindow setFrameOrigin:_CGPointMake(mouseLocation.x - _draggingOffset.width, mouseLocation.y - _draggingOffset.height)];
00324     [_draggedWindow setFrameSize:[aView frame].size];
00325 
00326     [[_draggedWindow contentView] addSubview:aView];
00327 
00328     _implementedDraggingSourceMethods = 0;
00329 
00330     if (_draggedView === _imageView)
00331     {
00332         if ([_draggingSource respondsToSelector:@selector(draggedImage:movedTo:)])
00333             _implementedDraggingSourceMethods |= CPDraggingSource_draggedImage_movedTo_;
00334 
00335         if ([_draggingSource respondsToSelector:@selector(draggedImage:endAt:operation:)])
00336             _implementedDraggingSourceMethods |= CPDraggingSource_draggedImage_endAt_operation_;
00337     }
00338     else
00339     {
00340         if ([_draggingSource respondsToSelector:@selector(draggedView:movedTo:)])
00341             _implementedDraggingSourceMethods |= CPDraggingSource_draggedView_movedTo_;
00342 
00343         if ([_draggingSource respondsToSelector:@selector(draggedView:endedAt:operation:)])
00344             _implementedDraggingSourceMethods |= CPDraggingSource_draggedView_endedAt_operation_;
00345     }
00346 
00347     if (![CPPlatform supportsDragAndDrop])
00348     {
00349         [self draggingStartedInPlatformWindow:[aWindow platformWindow] globalLocation:mouseLocation];
00350         [self trackDragging:mouseDownEvent];
00351     }
00352 }
00353 
00366 - (void)dragImage:(CPImage)anImage fromWindow:(CPWindow)aWindow at:(CGPoint)imageLocation offset:(CGSize)mouseOffset event:(CPEvent)anEvent pasteboard:(CPPasteboard)aPasteboard source:(id)aSourceObject slideBack:(BOOL)slideBack
00367 {
00368     _isDraggingImage = YES;
00369 
00370     var imageSize = [anImage size];
00371 
00372     if (!_imageView)
00373         _imageView = [[CPImageView alloc] initWithFrame:_CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, imageSize.width, imageSize.height)];
00374 
00375     [_imageView setImage:anImage];
00376 
00377     [self dragView:_imageView fromWindow:aWindow at:imageLocation offset:mouseOffset event:anEvent pasteboard:aPasteboard source:aSourceObject slideBack:slideBack];
00378 }
00379 
00380 - (void)trackDragging:(CPEvent)anEvent
00381 {
00382     var type = [anEvent type],
00383         platformWindow = [_draggedWindow platformWindow],
00384         platformWindowLocation = [[anEvent window] convertBaseToPlatformWindow:[anEvent locationInWindow]];
00385 
00386     if (type === CPLeftMouseUp)
00387     {
00388         [self performDragOperationInPlatformWindow:platformWindow];
00389         [self draggingEndedInPlatformWindow:platformWindow globalLocation:platformWindowLocation operation:CPDragOperationNone];
00390 
00391         // Stop tracking events.
00392         return;
00393     }
00394 
00395     [self draggingSourceUpdatedWithGlobalLocation:platformWindowLocation];
00396     [self draggingUpdatedInPlatformWindow:platformWindow location:platformWindowLocation];
00397 
00398     // If we're not a mouse up, then we're going to want to grab the next event.
00399     [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackDragging:)
00400         forNextEventMatchingMask:CPMouseMovedMask | CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask
00401         untilDate:nil inMode:0 dequeue:NO];
00402 }
00403 
00404 @end
00405 
00406 @implementation CPWindow (CPDraggingAdditions)
00407 
00408 /* @ignore */
00409 - (id)_dragHitTest:(CGPoint)aPoint pasteboard:(CPPasteboard)aPasteboard
00410 {
00411     // If none of our views or ourselves has registered for drag events...
00412     if (!_inclusiveRegisteredDraggedTypes)
00413         return nil;
00414 
00415 // We don't need to do this because the only place this gets called
00416 // -_dragHitTest: in CPPlatformWindow does this already. Perhaps to
00417 // be safe?
00418 //    if (![self containsPoint:aPoint])
00419 //        return nil;
00420 
00421     var adjustedPoint = [self convertPlatformWindowToBase:aPoint],
00422         hitView = [_windowView hitTest:adjustedPoint];
00423 
00424     while (hitView && ![aPasteboard availableTypeFromArray:[hitView registeredDraggedTypes]])
00425         hitView = [hitView superview];
00426 
00427     if (hitView)
00428         return hitView;
00429 
00430     if ([aPasteboard availableTypeFromArray:[self registeredDraggedTypes]])
00431         return self;
00432 
00433     return nil;
00434 }
